## ensurePromise() function

Ensure the value is a promise

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function ensurePromise<T>(p: legacy.PromiseOrVoid<T>): Promise<T>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  p | legacy.PromiseOrVoid&lt;T&gt; | Promise or void |
